title: Keep Pets Warm
text: Make sure your pets have cozy blankets and sweaters to protect them from the cold during winter.

title: Moisturize Their Paws
text: Use pet-safe balm to keep your petâ€™s paws soft and prevent cracking caused by dry winter air.

title: Serve Warm Meals
text: Provide slightly warm food and water to help maintain your petâ€™s body temperature in chilly weather.
